newsitem.title: USA: Crown Casino hires adviser to mull options.
newsitem.headline: Crown Casino hires adviser to mull options.

text.p: Crown Casino Corp said on Tuesday it engaged an investment banking firm to help the company evaluate merger and acquisition opportunities.

The company said in a statement it hired Los Angeles-based Jefferies & Co to help it indentify, evaluate and complete mergers and acquisitions. Jefferies specialized in middle-market growth companies focused on gaming, it said.

Edward R. McMurphy, president, said: "The gaming industry is in the beginning of a consolidation phase and we believe we can maximize shareholder value by being involved in the consolidation process."
